nodes.text: Borzu Nale was a male Fluggrian crime lord, and father of Kam Nale. During or prior to 32 BBY, Nale was assassinated by the Glymphid hit-man Aldar Beedo, who was hired by Nale's rival, Orin Nyell. This caused Kam Nale to endure a long lasting hunt for Beedo which inlcuded the Fluggrian changing his name to "Elan Mak," becoming a Podracer pilot, and eventually reclaim his father's criminal empire. Borzu Nale was eventually avenged during 22 BBY, when a mercenary hired by Kam captured Beedo on the planet of Baroonda.
